name: Handmade Personalised Birthday Fabric Rosette
description:
These beautiful handmade birthday rosette makes a lovely moment of the day to keep forever. 

They have lots of ribbons trail down from the central rosette, made from vintage fabric and cotton with a hand stitched number or letter. . 

Can be made in any colour, each rosette will vary slightly in size as they are hand cut and sewn from scratch.

Our Rosettes are handmade in our small Essex studio, a beautiful and unique personalised gift for any child, new baby or christening.

When ordering select colour way you require and the name (10 letters) or age to be embroidered on the rosette. 

Measurements: approx. 9cm diameter 

Materials: Beautiful fabric and ribbons

Due to be made by hand orders can take up to two weeks.

name: Handmade Wooden Personalised Signs
description:
Handmade Personalised Door Signs
 
A beautiful handmade vintage style door sign, which may be personalised with a name of your choice.

This handmade door plaque can be painted in a choice of Cream. Sage Green, Powder Blue, Powder Pink, Aubergine, Grey, Morris Blue or Natural. 

The names that we painted onto the front of the plaque are in cream unless stated 


When ordering select colour way you require and the name (8 letters) or age to be painted onto the plaque. 

Our signs are handmade in our small Essex studio, a beautiful and unique personalised gift for any child, new baby or christening. They can be hung from a bedroom door, or wall, perhaps above a bed or cot.

As each sign is made from reclaimed wood there will be slight variations in the markings and thickness. But this is what gives our work their unique charm.

Materials: Recycled Wood 

Measurements: 10cm (W) x 20cm (H)

Due to being made by hand orders may take up to two weeks.
